ValidationRule.description: EPLI Supplemental Coverage Adjusted Rate cannot be lower than 80% of base rate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND( (Directors_Officers_Employment_Practice__c = TRUE), CONTAINS( Coverages__c , "Employment Practices Liability"), EPLI_Base_Rate__c * 0.80 > EPLI_Supplemental_Coverage_Adjusted_Rate__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: EPLI Supplemental Coverage Adjusted Rate cannot be lower than 80% of base rate. Please update your inputs to stay above the minimum premium.
